version_description:
Missions Mode is here! Available to all players who have beaten Story Mode.
- Put your Earn to Die 2 skills to the test
- Complete 50 Missions across 10 Levels and unlock Achievements!

Enhanced for 3D Touch
- Pressing the Accelerate button harder will now activate the Boost on devices which support 3D Touch.

Indonesian and Malaysian localisations added.

Small tweaks.

Stay tuned, we will have a new game mode (Exploration Mode), launching in the coming weeks!

Surviving Story Mode was only just the beginning...

Introducing Exploration Mode!
- Steer your vehicles through each level (and through zombie hordes) in search for hidden Survival Kits.
- 60 Survival Kits hidden across 15 level segments. Can you collect them all?
- 5 New Achievements

Earn to Die 2 has been enhanced!
- 60fps support added for iPhone 6S and newer, iPad Air 2 and newer. Smashing zombies is smoother than ever before!
- Optimizations for newer devices
